content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions, but I can provide information based on available evidence. The most effective method for identifying and mitigating risks in a large-scale construction project depends on various factors, including the project's complexity, resources available, and the skills and expertise of the risk assessment team. However, a combination of some or all of the methods mentioned above could provide a more comprehensive analysis and better results. A risk assessment team can select the most appropriate methods based on their experience and the specific needs of the project. It is also essential to update the risk assessment regularly to address new risks that may emerge during the project's lifespan.
